name: Veterinary Conferences
content: Peers Alley Media meetings would like to invite all the outstanding Veterinarians, Veterinary Academicians, Research Scholars, Veterinary Technicians, Veterinary Professionals and Students, Veterinary Nurse, Veterinary Organization members, Veterinary Societies, Veterinary Associations, Animal Health Companies, Manufacturing Companies, Animal Trainers, Drug Development Companies from all around the world to attend Euro Veterinary Science Congress from April 02-03, 2020 in Paris, France. URL: https://veterinary.peersalleyconferences.com/
